scripts.start: CLIENT_ID=${SPA_CLIENT_ID:=$CLIENT_ID} && REACT_APP_ISSUER=$ISSUER REACT_APP_CLIENT_ID=$CLIENT_ID PORT=8080 react-scripts start
scripts.build: CLIENT_ID=${SPA_CLIENT_ID:=$CLIENT_ID} && REACT_APP_ISSUER=$ISSUER REACT_APP_CLIENT_ID=$CLIENT_ID PORT=8080 react-scripts build
scripts.pretest: yarn kill:port && ./node_modules/.bin/webdriver-manager update --versions.chrome 2.40 --gecko false && yarn build:test
scripts.test: yarn build && yarn wait:server && yarn protractor
